text:
Finimize | London, UK | Frontend Developer | ONSITE INTERNS | http://finimize.com/

We’re looking for a frontend dev intern to help redesign finance for a younger generation. As an intern at Finimize, you’ll gain a lot of tech experience and will be encouraged to take risks and broaden your skills. You’ll be working with our Head of Product as well as our founders to help drive growth and work on new products launching in 2017.

Job link: http://www.finimize.com/joblistings/frontend-development-int...
